ygData.subject: Re: faction
ygData.msgSnippet: yes, u can lose faction and be KOS in neriak.  in fact, on the PvP server, they put in a faction system that really sux.  many ppl cannot go back to their home
ygData.messageBody:
yes, u can lose faction and be KOS in neriak. in fact, on the PvP server,
they put in a faction system that really sux. many ppl cannot go back to
their home towns. even in duels and guild wars, u lose faction.

Sinlaru Ce`alen
Rallos Zek

-----Original Message-----
From: Kelly P. Lewandowski <4x4rednecks@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, June 20, 1999 1:53 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] faction


>From: "Kelly P. Lewandowski" <4x4rednecks@...>
>
>Off topic:
>
>I am a dark elf wizard
>does any one know if you can lose enough faction with the neriak guards so
>that they KOS you,
>and if they do at about what lvl would this happen.
>
>If you kill 5 orcs you can go by the guards at freeport and they look at
you
>dubiously. Appreciate
>any responses.
>
>
>
>BloodShadow lvl 8
>Veeshan
>
